overview: September 9th, 2011 :: Dragon Gate USA presents Chasing The Dragon 2011 from Indianapolis, IN. Get ready for perhaps the most athletic contest you'll ever witness in the main event. It is a Captain's Match pitting PAC (captain), AR Fox & Rich Swann vs. Ricochet (captain), CIMA & Akira Tozawa. This is off the charts action!!! Plus, a hard-hitting war pitting Naruki Doi vs. Sami Callihan, tag team excellence when Johnny Gargano & Chuck Taylor team to take on YAMATO & Masato Yoshino plus lots more including a Six Way Elimination Match.  -Captain's Six Man Tag Team Match  PAC, Rich Swann & AR Fox vs. Ricochet, CIMA & Akira Tozawa  -YAMATO & Masato Yoshino vs. Johnny Gargano & Chuck Taylor  -Pinkie Sanchez vs. Louis Lyndon  -Naruki Doi vs. Sami Callihan  -Six Way Elimination Match  Brodie Lee vs. BJ Whitmer vs. Sugar Dunkerton vs. Mike Sydal vs. Flip Kendrick vs. Billy Roc  -Arik Cannon vs. Jon Davis  -Uhaa Nation vs. Aaron Draven  -The Scene vs. Tripp Cassidy & Remi Wilkins
title: DGUSA Chasing The Dragon 2011
